detailsOfAchievement: Mathangi girl Children free from mathangi evil system Conducted Social Marriages to Mathangis Behavioural changes among Hizras Education to the Mathangi children Constructed Toilets in mandals of AP under Swach Bharath Mission Program Dappu units were provided to the Dappu beaters of Dappu community with skill upgradation for their better livelihood and respect in the society Land was provided to the Mathammas under the process of rehabilitation program in the state of AP

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The purpose of this project is mainly to control HIV and AIDS among MSM and transgender community. 2000 MSM and Hizra population were motivated regarding HIV and AIDS Control and usage of Condoms through this project. DUTIES conducted awareness programs, condom promotion programs, person to person motivation, focus group meetings area wise community meeting for the targeted communities. For this important program DUTIES given peer educators training program to enhance their capacity Building.

HIV and AIDS Positives Care and support center . The purpose of this project is to motivate and counsel with medical support to the HIV victims. They are also given General treatment and care to the patient and one attendant for ten days. They are also provided with food and medicines at our ten beded hospital.

Eradication of Mathangi Evil System. DUTIES working against the evil practices like Mathangi/Basivini under the umbrella of Devadasi system in Six Districts of Andhra Pradesh. We are working to rehabilitate the victims by implimenting the Devadasi prohibition Act 10 1988 department of Social Welfare Andhra pradesh and its implimentation.

To provide livelihood programs to the Dakkali community who are Untouchables among Untouchables of the Madiga Dalits moving from place to place in the entire state of A.P. We given awareness and livelihood units to live in one place with permanant address by utilising the services of Local Government and provided Ration card , Adhar Card etc. for their new life.

detailsOfAchievement: DHATRI FOUNDATION is the society formed to dedicate itself for the Development of Human Accord Technically Resetting Integrals. It focuses on various aspects and strives for the overall development of the society integrating the resources accordingly. DHATRI targets mainly for the uplift the down trodden and provides them support. It works through its various wings in diverse areas which needs attention. WOMEN EMPOWERMENT CELL works for supporting the women in need. VILLAGE RESOURCE CENTERS which adopts and helps to provide the basic amenities in the village and develops it as model village. MEDICAL AID AND AWARENESS is providing medical support to the deprived classes. LEARN2LEAD, intensive training program is specially designed for participants from a wide range of backgrounds and who wish to improve their careers. SOLE SCHOOL OF LEARNING AND EARNING concentrates on education, employment and development. DHATRI creates linkup between the opportunities and aspirants by providing necessary skill training. Goals To identify the potential employment options available for the below poverty line (BPL) employable unemployed Graduate youth between the age group of 18 -30 and train them in skills according to the market requirements, thereby working towards achieving the goals of poverty reduction and employment generation. To provide young adults from economically weak backgrounds an opportunity to assimilate into the competitive job market and to help them acquire the required employable and social skills.
